title: Text of a Letter from the President to Certain Chairmen of House and Senate Committees on the National Strategy for Counterterrorism â€“ The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		National Security & Defense	

Issued on:
November 26, 2018
Dear Mr. Chairman:In accordance with section 1094(a) of the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2018 (Public Law 115 91), I have enclosed the classified version of the National Strategy for Counterterrorism.Sincerely,DONALD J. TRUMP
